column5: Yea I know Im really pumping you guys now., but I was wondering if anyone could share some North Channel pike locations, hopefully in the area of the Spanish. I thank everyone who helped me with the walleye questions.  Thanks  Darren

You'll find pike in the river almost anywhere. Going out the rivermouth, the bays along the north shore are good. There's one out front of Brennan Harbour Resort, and Vance's Bay a little farther along. There's the north side of Boomcamp Bay and there's a lagoon surrounded by little islands at the southwest end of Green Island. Watch for rocks and logs and watch the weather.
